mapper.sql: msg_id, user_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, category, action, params, goto_url, title, summary, icon_url, service_time, add_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from user_msg where 1=1
and user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
and ( (add_time >= #{startTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and add_time <= #{endTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) OR (service_time >= #{serviceTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC} and service_time <= #{serviceTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}) )
order by update_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into user_msg (msg_id, user_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, category, action, params, goto_url, title, summary, icon_url, service_time, add_time, update_time) values (#{msgId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{userId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{fromUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{toUserId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gotoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{addTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
